document.docAuthor: Asiain, Julieta, Márquez, Juan & Irmler, Urlich
document.masterDocTitle: New national and state records of Neotropical Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New national and state records of Neotropical Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera)

subSubSection.paragraph:
9 .
Lispinus paratardus
Irmler, 1994
. New national records to México , Guatemala , El Salvador , Nicaragua , Panamá and French Guyana , and new state records to Chiapas, Oaxaca, San Luis Potosí, Tamaulipas and Veracruz (
Fig. 5
a).

New national and state records: "
México
: Chiapas, Palenque, 100 m ,
09-05- 1969

26 -06- 1965

2 -08- 1963

01-05- 1969

10 .
Nacaeus honduranus Irmler, 2006
. New national record to Panamá and new state record to Veracruz ( México ) (
Fig. 3
a).

New national record: "
Panamá
: La Fortuna , Continental Divide Trail, Heliconis leaves, 1150 m elev.,
09-06- 1999
, Ashe, J. S." ( 1 , KNHM ).

New state record: “ México : Veracruz, Zongolica, Ocotitla, bosque mesófilo de montaña, 1352 m , en tronco caído,
1 -XII- 1997
, Q. Santiago y J. Márquez cols.” ( 1 , MZFC ).

11 .
Nacaeus opacus (Fauvel, 1864 )
. New national records to Nicaragua and Venezuela (
Fig. 5
a).

New national records: “
Nicaragua
: Granada , Reserva Biológica Volcán Mombacho, bosque mesófilo de montaña, 1039 m ,
N 11 ° 50.25 ’
,
W 85 ° 58.593 ’
, en troncos podridos,
2 -II- 2000
, J. Márquez col.” ( 1 , MZFC ). "
Venezuela
: Aragua, Rancho Grande, Portachuelo Pass, under bark, 1100 m elev.,
13 -05- 1998
, Ashe, J. S." ( 1 , KNHM ).

12 .
Tannea tenella (Erichson, 1840 )
. New state record to Hidalgo ( México ) (
Fig. 4
a).

New state record: “ México : Hidalgo, Tlanchinol, La Cabaña, bosque mesófilo de montaña, 1462 m ,
N 21 °01.333’
,
W 98 ° 38.650 ’
, trampa de intercepción de vuelo 4,
18 a 25 -III- 2006
, C. Ortíz y M. C. Pedraza cols.” ( 1 , CC-UAEH). Same data as previous except: "
16 a 23 -VII- 2005
, M. C. Pedraza, E. Pedraza y C. Ortíz cols.” ( 1 , CC- UAEH ). “ México : Hidalgo, Zacualtipán de Ángeles, camino a Santo Domingo , bosque mesófilo de montaña, 1830 m ,
N 20 ° 37.749 ’
,
W 98 ° 34.8 ’
, trampa de intercepción de vuelo,
6 a 7 -VI- 2004
, J. Márquez y J. Asiain cols.” ( 1 , CC-UAEH).
